About us

Our mission is to create, distribute and engage in original high-quality and trusted content

Diwanee Serbia was established in 2010 and now is a leading digital media company, building on one of the largest audiences in the Middle East and the GCC.

Our mission: Create, distribute and engage our audience in original, high quality and trusted content focused on life style, mainly beauty, fashion, food, family and entertainment.

Our audience: 10.2M unique users, 110M video views, 25M page views, 27M fans across platforms.

Our media brands

With our brands we are reaching over 10.2 million users on a monthly basis, and 25 milion page views
